content:
During the day, the Russian army attacked Nikopol region with artillery and shock drones.

About thisreportedHead of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional Military Administration Serhiy Lysak.

“An enemy artillery worked again in the Nikopol district today. There were two shelling during the day. And the aggressor made seven attacks by Kamikadze drones and dropped the UAV ammunition, ”he said.

According to Sergiy Lisak, Nikopol and the Mirovsky community were hit. Damaged private home and garage.

Fortunately, it was without the victims.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Dnipropetrovsk Ukrainian air defensedestroyed the enemy managed rocket X-59.
title: The occupiers attacked Nikopol region by shock drones seven times
description: This was announced by the head of the Dnipropetrovsk Regional Military Administration Serhiy Lysak.  "In the Nikopol district...
author: Army Inform
